mapper.select:
SELECT
from t_mall_store o left join t_mall_page p on p.pag_sto_id=o.id and p.pag_is_main=1
o.is_delete = 0
and o.sto_user_id=#{userId}
and o.sto_name like '%${stoName}%'
AND o.`wx_shop_id` in
#{item}

select
from t_mall_store t
is_delete = 0
and wx_shop_id in
#{shopId}
select count(p.id) from t_mall_store s left join t_mall_page p on p.pag_sto_id=s.id where s.wx_shop_id=#{wxShopId} and s.is_delete=0

SELECT s.sto_picture AS stoPicture , s.id,mp.id AS pageId FROM t_mall_store s LEFT JOIN t_mall_page mp ON mp.pag_sto_id=s.id AND pag_is_main=1 WHERE is_delete = 0 AND s.sto_user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY s.id DESC
